business.headline: Job model that built India is dying, warns Marcellus Investment's Saurabh MukherjeaSpeaking on a recent podcast titled Beyond the Paycheck: India's Entrepreneurial Rebirth, Saurabh Mukherjea issued a clear and unsettling warning: salaried employment, long considered the golden path to financial security, is dying.
Sensex jumps 500 points, Nifty above 23,500; banking stocks lift marketThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 374.89 points to 78,928.09, while the NSE Nifty50 added 84.85 points to 23,936.50 as of 9:27 am.

Stock market opening today: Will Sensex, Nifty continue their winning rally?Sensex, Nifty today: While strong results from HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank may help, weak global cues and disappointing Q4 results from Infosys could hold back gains.

Stocks to watch on April 21: TCS, Infosys, Gensol Engineering, HDFC Bank, IndigoShares of several major companies such as TCS, Inofsys, HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, BHEL, Gensol Engineering, IndiGo, among others, will be in focus on April 21.

Gensol faces government inquiry after Rs 975 crore EV loan misuse: SourcesAccording to sources, the MCA's move is an independent action aimed at investigating potential corporate governance lapses and financial irregularities. There is no fixed timeline for the inquiry.

India-US trade talks from April 23, tariffs, customs negotiations on agenda: ReportThe Indian official team is visiting the US to give further impetus to the negotiations in the 90-day tariff pause window and discuss these terms of reference to iron out differences on certain issues.

Ford pauses shipments of SUVs, sports cars and other models to ChinaFord has halted exports of key US-built vehicles to China amid rising tariffs and trade tensions, impacting a once-profitable segment of its business, WSJ reports. Engine shipments, however, continue.
No GST on UPI transactions over Rs 2,000, government clarifiesUPI payments, especially those made to merchants, currently don't attract any extra charges like GST.

ICICI Bank cuts FD and savings rates. Check what's newIf you have a savings account with ICICI Bank, you'll now earn slightly less. For balances below Rs 50 lakh, the new interest rate is 2.75% per annum, down from 3%.

Infosys lets go of 240 new recruits, offers free upskilling: ReportThe impacted employees joined the company in October 2024 as part of a training batch. The freshers were hired for two roles; System Engineers (SE) and Digital Specialist Engineers (DSE).

Nvidia to keep serving Chinese firms despite massive AI chip export lossHuang's statement comes at a time when the United States has tightened rules around exporting advanced chips to China. The restrictions, announced under the Donald Trump administration, are part of an ongoing trade war between the two countries.

Want to change your tax regime while filing ITR? Here's what you should knowLet's say you had earlier chosen the old tax regime, but now the new regime appears more beneficial after reviewing your finances. Can you change it when filing your ITR? Let's find out here.

entertainment.headline: Kesari 2 box office Day 3: Akshay Kumar's film sees big growth on EasterAkshay Kumar's courtroom drama 'Kesari Chapter 2' received a phenomenal response over the Easter holiday. The film earned Rs 29.75 crore in three days.

Aishwarya Rai shares family pic on wedding anniversary, first in over a yearAishwarya Rai Bachchan shared a family picture with Abhishek and Aaradhya, marking their 18th wedding anniversary. Their fans congratulated them on their anniversary.

Stand tall or stay silent: Rapper Asim Riaz's rebuttal to actor Abhinav ShuklaAmidst a heated controversy, rapper Asim Riaz has addressed actor Abhinav Shukla's claims of receiving death threats from an alleged Lawrence Bishnoi gang member. This follows a spat between Riaz and Rubina Dilaik on a reality show, escalating tensions further.

Ajay Devgn, Kajol share sweetest wishes for daughter Nysa on her 22nd birthdayNysa Devgan, daughter of Kajol and Ajay Devgn, turned 22 on April 20. To mark the occasion, her parents shared heartfelt birthday wishes along with beautiful pictures of her.

Katrina Kaif flaunts 'VK' mehndi in cute pic with Vicky Kaushal at a weddingAt a friend's wedding, actor Katrina Kaif showcased a special mehndi design dedicated to her husband, Vicky Kaushal. The intricate 'VK' mehndi left fans in awe and quickly became the talk of the town.

Actor Abhinav Shukla gets death threat from 'Bishnoi gang'Actor Abhinav Shukla has been threatened on Instagram by a person claiming to be a member of the Lawrence Bishnoi gang. The threat follows his wife Rubina Dilaik's controversy with Asim Riaz on 'Battleground'.

Simran criticises co-actor for insensitive remark on doing 'aunty roles'Tamil actor Simran publicly called out a fellow actor for making an insensitive remark about 'aunty roles'. Expressing her shock, Simran stated that she'd rather portray such roles with dignity than take on a meaningless or 'dabba' role.

Disha Patani's sister rescues abandoned baby girl, vows to secure her futureActor Disha Patani's sister, Khushboo Patani, a former army officer, shared a video in which she was seen rescuing a girl child lying in the dirt behind her house.

Malavika Mohanan exposes South industry's 'navel obsession', shares her experienceActor Malavika Mohanan recalled being body-shamed in both the South Indian and the Hindi film industry. She also talked about the South Indian industry's 'naval' obsession.

In Mohanlal's 'too profound for words' moment, a signed jersey by Lionel MessiMalayalam superstar Mohanlal couldn't contain his joy when his friends brought him one of the biggest gifts of his life - a signed jersey by football legend Lionel Messi. Here's what he had to say about that 'unforgettable moment'.

Malayalam actor Shine Tom Chacko's brother defends him in drugs case with sarcasmMalayalam actor Shine Tom Chacko was arrested and later released on bail in a drug-related case. His brother, Joe John Chako, now spoke to the media, and defended the actor by asking if none of them had ever visited a de-addiction centre before.

Jaat box office Day 10: Sunny Deol's film faces Kesari 2 with grace and strengthSunny Deol's 'Jaat' has slowed down at the box office with the release of Akshay Kumar's 'Kesari Chapter 2' this weekend. A slight dip was expected, but it will be interesting to see how far the film can go now.

Manoj Muntashir calls Anurag Kashyap 'sick': You can't pollute Brahmin legacyLyricist Manoj Muntashir shared a video on social media, slamming Anurag Kashyap for his alleged casteist remark against Brahmins. He also issued an open challenge to him in the video.

Sunny Deol enjoys nature walk before Border 2 shoot, thanks fans for JaatAmid the massive success of his film 'Jaat', Sunny Deol is unwinding in the valleys. Sharing a serene video on Sunday, the actor thanked fans for their overwhelming love and promised that the sequel would be even more entertaining.

Bombai Ka Babu: Incest, identity, inner conflict in Dev Anand-Suchitra's bold filmIn 'Retro Review' this weekend, we explore 'Bombai Ka Babu', a film starring Dev Anand and Suchitra Sen. It is a hauntingly beautiful setup with the themes of incest and identity.

BTS Jin joins Chris Martin in surprise jig, his 1st after military discharge. VideosBTS Jin surprised his fans when he joined Coldlay's Chris Martin at a concert in Seoul on Saturday. The two performed 'The Astronaut' and 'My Universe' for the crowd, and their videos are now going viral on social media.

Kesari 2 box office Day 2: Akshay's film poised for a fantastic Rs 30 crore weekendAkshay Kumar's 'Kesari Chapter 2' saw fabulous growth in its collection on the second day, which raised the expectations for its overall run. The film has largely received positive reviews on social media, which will help boost its collection further.

Unni Mukundan says films can't be blamed for drug abuse amid Shine Tom Chacko rowAmid the arrest of Malayalam actor Shine Tom Chacko in a drugs case, fellow actor Unni Mukundan has come forward to defend the film industry. He argued that cinema alone should not be blamed for such incidents.

Resident Playbook review: A spin-off that honours the legacy of Hospital PlaylistReleased-Sat Apr 12, 2025'Resident Playbook' offers a gritty take on the medical drama genre, focusing on the challenges faced by young residents. With emotional depth and realistic portrayals, it stands as a compelling addition to the 'Hospital Playlist' universe.

general news.headline: JD Vance lands in Delhi, to hold bilateral with PM under US tariffs shadow Live Updates US Vice President JD Vance, along with his wife Usha and three children, is on a four-day visit to India. This marks his first official visit to the country.

Schizophrenic mother imagined threats, killed Karnataka ex-top cop: Son in FIRBased on Kartik's complaint, the police have filed murder charges against Om Prakash's wife, Pallavi and daughter, Kruti after the retired officer was found dead at his Bengaluru residence with multiple stab wounds.

US defence chief shared Yemen strike plans in chat with wife, brother: ReportPete Hegseth shared sensitive information - including the flight timings of the combat aircrafts used to target Houthi targets on Yemeni soil - with his family and lawyer.

Appeasement won't bring peace: China opposes trade deals with US at its expenseA spokesperson from China's Ministry of Commerce (MOFCOM) said China respects the right of all countries to address economic and trade differences with the US through consultations conducted on an equal footing.

Disha Patani's sister rescues abandoned baby girl, vows to secure her futureActor Disha Patani's sister, Khushboo Patani, a former army officer, shared a video in which she was seen rescuing a girl child lying in the dirt behind her house.
One temple, one well, one cremation ground: RSS chief urges Hindu unityCurrently on a five-day visit to Aligarh, the RSS chief addressed 'swayamsevaks' at two separate 'shakhas'.

Jharkhand Karni Sena chief found dead with gunshot wound, pistol in handNews of Vinay Singh's death triggered outrage among his supporters, who gathered late Sunday night and blocked National Highway--33 near Dimna Chowk, a key route connecting Jamshedpur to Kolkata and Odisha.

IPL 2025: How 17-year-old Ayush Mhatre impressed MS Dhoni at CSK netsChennai Super Kings (CSK) head coach Stephen Fleming revealed how Ayush Mhatre stood out in their mid-season trials and impressed MS Dhoni to earn a spot in the squad.

Aishwarya Rai shares family pic on wedding anniversary, first in over a yearAishwarya Rai Bachchan shared a family picture with Abhishek and Aaradhya, marking their 18th wedding anniversary. Their fans congratulated them on their anniversary.
Sensex jumps 500 points, Nifty above 23,500; banking stocks lift marketThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 374.89 points to 78,928.09, while the NSE Nifty50 added 84.85 points to 23,936.50 as of 9:27 am.
Video: Chennai man risks life to save boy from electrocution on flooded streetA man rescued a 9-year-old boy from being electrocuted in a waterlogged street in Chennai.

IPL 2025 almost over for CSK: Srikkanth's damning verdict after MI hammeringIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: Former batter Kris Srikkanth said that Chennai Super Kings' campaign in the tournament is more or less over after their nine-wicket defeat to Mumbai Indians.

High-tempo with smart batting: Rohit Sharma shows his relevance in modern T20 gameRohit Sharma stormed back into form and showed how his ability to tweak his game effectively shows that the MI legend still has a place in the modern T20 game.

Israel says 'professional failures' led to killings of 15 Gaza medics, fires commanderIsrael at first claimed that the medics' vehicles did not have emergency signals on when troops opened fire but later backtracked.

Muslim Commissioner: BJP's Nishikant Dubey now targets former poll panel chiefResponding to former Chief Election Commissioner SY Quraishi's post on X over the Waqf Amendment Act, BJP MP Nishikant Dubey called him "not an Election Commissioner, but a Muslim Commissioner".

Hindu minister attacked during protest in Pakistan, Shehbaz Sharif assures probeKheal Das Kohistani, a Pakistani Hindu minister, was attacked in Sindh by protesters opposing the government's irrigation canal projects in the province. Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif condemned the attack and assured of a thorough probe into the incident.

Houses, shops washed away overnight; need special aid: Residents on Ramban floodsResidents of Jammu and Kashmir's Ramban district, where heavy rain triggered flash floods, said their shops and houses were damaged due to landslides and urged the government to announce a special package to compensate their losses.

Did he ask his wife? Nitish Rane jabs Uddhav amid Thackerays' reunion buzzReacting to the reunion buzz between estranged cousins Uddhav Thackeray and Raj Thackeray, BJP's Nitesh Rane jabbed at the Shiv Sena (UBT) chief and asked whether he had consulted his wife Rashmi Thackeray on the same.

Congress to 'expose BJP's lies' in National Herald case through nationwide pressersThe party's media and publicity department head, Pawan Khera, announced the campaign via a post on social media platform X stating that 57 leaders across the country will hold press conferences.

Nitish Kumar changes party for kursi: Congress targets BJP-JDU allianceAddressing a Congress rally in Buxur, the party president urged voters to oust BJP and JD(U) from power and elect the Mahagathbandhan in the elections scheduled later this year.

Katrina Kaif flaunts 'VK' mehndi in cute pic with Vicky Kaushal at a weddingAt a friend's wedding, actor Katrina Kaif showcased a special mehndi design dedicated to her husband, Vicky Kaushal. The intricate 'VK' mehndi left fans in awe and quickly became the talk of the town.

Marathi still mandatory in Maharashtra: Devendra Fadnavis on 3-language policyThe Maharashtra government announced plans to make Hindi a compulsory third language in Marathi and English medium schools in the state under the National Education Policy (NEP) 2020.

Lawyer seeks contempt action against BJP MP for remarks against Supreme CourtAdvocate Anas Tanveer has written to Attorney General R Venkatramani seeking consent to initiate contempt proceedings against BJP MP Nishikant Dubey for his remarks against the Chief Justice of India and Supreme Court.

Dalit man sexually assaulted, urinated upon in Rajasthan; accused filmed actThe young man told his family about the incident eight days later, following which a police complaint was filed, and a case was registered against the two accused.

sports.headline: IPL 2025: Shreyas Iyer's sister Shresta hits back at trolls after PBKS' loss vs RCBPunjab Kings' (PBKS) captain Shreyas Iyer's sister Shresta has hit back at trolls following Punjab's loss against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in Match 37 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

MI vs CSK: Powerplay woes keep haunting Chennai in horror IPL 2025 campaignIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: Former batter Sunil Gavaskar was clear cut in saying that Chennai Super Kings need to up their game in the powerplay to put oppositions under pressure. On Sunday, CSK lost to MI by nine wickets and kept languishing at the bottom.

Need to be a bit more proactive with bat, we're lacking confidence: CSK head coachChennai Super Kings (CSK) head coach Stephen Fleming said that the team needs to be a bit more proactive with the bat throughout the innings but is lacking confidence at the moment.

IPL 2025: How 17-year-old Ayush Mhatre impressed MS Dhoni at CSK netsChennai Super Kings (CSK) head coach Stephen Fleming revealed how Ayush Mhatre stood out in their mid-season trials and impressed MS Dhoni to earn a spot in the squad.

High-tempo with smart batting: Rohit Sharma shows his relevance in modern T20 gameRohit Sharma stormed back into form and showed how his ability to tweak his game effectively shows that the MI legend still has a place in the modern T20 game.

IPL 2025 almost over for CSK: Srikkanth's damning verdict after MI hammeringIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: Former batter Kris Srikkanth said that Chennai Super Kings' campaign in the tournament is more or less over after their nine-wicket defeat to Mumbai Indians.

Rohit Sharma will continue high-intent game, MI will encourage it: JayawardeneMahela Jayawardene said that Rohit Sharma will continue to play his high-intent game after the MI star came back into form against CSK in the IPL El Clasico on April 20. Rohit was the match-winner for Mumbai as they thrashed Chennai by 9 wickets.

Devdutt Padikkal's IPL resurgence: RCB batter reveals mantra behind formDevdutt Padikkal revealed the success mantra behind the upturn in his form during the IPL 2025 season. Padikkal, after a couple of poor seasons, has scored 180 runs in 7 matches for RCB this campaign.

RCB's home woes down to Chinnaswamy pitch? Devdutt Padikkal respondsDevdutt Padikkal feels that RCB's home woes aren't pitch-related and hopes that they can win in their next fixture at the Chinnaswamy Stadium. RCB has yet to win a home game this season.

Rohit Sharma's form was never a reason to worry: Hardik PandyaIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: Hardik Pandya said that Rohit Sharma's form with the bat was hardly a cause of concern for the Mumbai Indians. On Sunday, Rohit's unbeaten 76 helped MI beat CSK by nine wickets.

Rohit back in form: How minor tweaks, no self-doubt helped MI legend vs CSKRohit Sharma revealed the minor tweaks he made and how he didn't allow self-doubt to creep in as the MI legend roared back to form in the thumping win over CSK. Rohit was the match-winner for Mumbai as they beat Chennai on Sunday, April 20.

Rohit Sharma will continue high-intent game, MI will encourage it: JayawardeneMahela Jayawardene said that Rohit Sharma will continue to play his high-intent game after the MI star came back into form against CSK in the IPL El Clasico on April 20. Rohit was the match-winner for Mumbai as they thrashed Chennai by 9 wickets.

Devdutt Padikkal's IPL resurgence: RCB batter reveals mantra behind formDevdutt Padikkal revealed the success mantra behind the upturn in his form during the IPL 2025 season. Padikkal, after a couple of poor seasons, has scored 180 runs in 7 matches for RCB this campaign.

RCB's home woes down to Chinnaswamy pitch? Devdutt Padikkal respondsDevdutt Padikkal feels that RCB's home woes aren't pitch-related and hopes that they can win in their next fixture at the Chinnaswamy Stadium. RCB has yet to win a home game this season.

Rohit Sharma's form was never a reason to worry: Hardik PandyaIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: Hardik Pandya said that Rohit Sharma's form with the bat was hardly a cause of concern for the Mumbai Indians. On Sunday, Rohit's unbeaten 76 helped MI beat CSK by nine wickets.

Rohit back in form: How minor tweaks, no self-doubt helped MI legend vs CSKRohit Sharma revealed the minor tweaks he made and how he didn't allow self-doubt to creep in as the MI legend roared back to form in the thumping win over CSK. Rohit was the match-winner for Mumbai as they beat Chennai on Sunday, April 20.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
